title: Yasuo Windwall
body: I've been through this problem plenty of times when i need to wind wall an AA... especially of an adcs, however when they auto attack me and I manage to pull out my windwall, they somehow **still go through the wind wall and hit me**. It is very annoying especially in a clutch situation. Does anyone know why or how this problem occurs? :\ {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey man!

We'd have to see the footage to determine weather it's actually bug or not. Chances are it just **looks** like you blocked the auto-attack from your perspective, but in fact you triggered windwall too late.

This happens because the camera perspective on summoners rift is tilted sideways slightly, so [parallax error](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parallax) often occurs.
